text: @BBCNewsnight @maitlis COVID-19 is so hard "To be happy in this world, esp when youth is past, it is necessary to feel oneself not merely an isolated individual whose day will soon be over, but part of the stream of life flowing on from the first germ to the remote and unknown future." Bertrand Russell
